thumb.name: Always on My Mind Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMolly...%3Cbr%3EThinking of you. Thinking of you.%3Cbr%3EThinking of you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJust can't stop%3Cbr%3Ethinking of you.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Wish on the Wind
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAbe.%3Cbr%3Etoday I'm sending %3Cbr%3Ea lucky %3Cbr%3Elittle wish for you%3Cbr%3Eon the wind...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...that miracles and laughter%3Cbr%3Ewill always be there for you.%3Cbr%3Ejust when you need them%3Cbr%3Ethe most.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking of You with Love%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: In My Thoughts Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're in my thoughts...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...today and always.

thumb.name: Remember Me? Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHey. Adrian --%3Cbr%3ERemember me?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E[PETER MARTIN]%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhaddya mean --%3Cbr%3EPeter Martin who?
